      Rectified linear unit (ReLU) activation.

      A Sigmoid activation function.

      The hyperbolic tangent activation function takes the curved shape of the hyperbolic tangent.

      Activation[] Network.getActivations(int layer)

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Network.addHiddenLayer(int neurons, Activation activation, double bias)
      Add a hidden layer with the given number of neurons, the same activation function for each neuron, and the same bias for each neuron.
      void Network.addOutputLayer(int neurons, Activation activation, double bias)
      Add the output layer with the given number of neurons, the same activation function for each neuron, and the same bias for each neuron.
      static void NetworkUtils.setActivations(Network network, Activation[] data)
      Set all the activations passing an array.
